protocol.text: Plants were grown on soil at 23C under continuous light
total RNA was extracted using the plant RNeasy mini kit (Qiagen)
Biotinylated cRNA was prepared from 100 ng total RNA with GeneChip 3' IVT Express Kit (Affymetrix).
Following fragmentation, 15 ug of cRNA was hybridized for 16 h at 45C on GeneChip Arabidopsis ATH1 Genome Array. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450.
GeneChips were scanned using the GeneChip Scanner 3000 7G (Affymetrix).
Data were analyzed with the limma package embedded in the Robin software using RMA normalization. P-values were corrected using Benjamini Hochberg multiple testing correction.
